Text: What the F@$%. They claim the source is CHD. Then this is one is either a bad recode or a fake. Don't waste your time on this one. I downloaded both the 720 as the 1080 version from CHD and both versions have better audio and video than this release? Even the 720 version of CHD is better than this 1080 release in video. Audio sounds like a bade 2.0 to 5.1 recode.  Dare and compare! NLUPPER002 slipped big with this one...
